active_learning.discussion_prompt: In a group discussion, debate the advantages and challenges of exporting STIX Bundles in a multi-vendor threat intelligence ecosystem. Consider interoperability issues, data privacy (e.g., marking objects as 'tlp:amber'), and scalability for large datasets. Support your points with references to OASIS STIX documentation.
